channel.title: Restore on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Restore on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Selective restoration from backup
item.description: As part of the disaster recovery process, the Cloudant NoSQL database offers the database backup and restore through the command-line utilities such as couchbackup & couchrestore respectively. couchbackup - Dumps the JSON data from a database to a backup text file. couchrestore - Restores data from a backup text file to a database. The couchrestore utility has one limitation: it can restore the full database but canâ€™t selectively restore specific records.
